name: Rope Jog
description:
Story:

It's a sunny spring day, the perfect time for a quick jog, but you like to run in quite dangerous, even deadly, places. That's why you carry a rope with you all the time.

Controls:

The controls are shown best in the game, but they are also here:

  • SPACE to jump, wall jump and to let go of the rope;
  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys to use your rope (use the arrow keys if you are right-handed);
  • M to mute the song;
  • N to mute the sounds;
  • R to restart the level;
  • P to skip the level (only press once, if pressed more you will skip more levels).
General information:

There are 9 levels, with more to come, some more challenging than others, where you need to try to collect all the coins while avoiding spikes, wall jumping, and using your rope in creative ways.

Credits:
  • Code - me
  • Art - me
  • Song - found on pixabay (journey by Timmoor)
  • Sound effects - made with bsfxr
